text: Koszalin (; , ) is a city in northwestern Poland, in Western Pomerania. It is located south of the Baltic Sea coast, and the river Dzierżęcinka passes through it. The government of Koszalin County of West Pomeranian Voivodeship has been in Koszalin since 1999, and the city also had the government of the Koszalin Voivodeship from 1950 through 1998. == References == == Other websites == * Official City Authorities site * Technical University of Koszalin * ChefMoz Dining Guide * Unofficial Forum of Koszalin's Community * Koszalin in Your Wonder Beautiful Place * KoszalinCity.pl * Heimatkreis Köslin (German refugee's organization) Category:Cities in West Pomeranian Voivodeship
title: Koszalin
